title: Former Microsoft boss Steve Ballmer: ‘I had some issues with Bill Gates. We were over-testosteroned young men’
text:
Steve Ballmer is hunched over an iPhone, punching letters into the browser’s search box. We are well over the time allotted for our interview and I am starting to grow nervous that Ballpmer, who sticks to a strict schedule, will be whisked away before The Telegraph’s photographer has time for the shoot.

“What do you use, do you use Bing or Google?” he asks, interrogating the PR representative who’s phone he is gripping as he searches for an old quote he is fond of. When she concedes that the phone defaults to Google’s search engine, he exhales: “I always find it on Bing!”
